titleStmt.title: Præterita, or, A summary of several sermons the greater part preached many years past, in several places, and upon sundry occasion / by John Ramsey ...
titleStmt.author: Ramsey, John, Minister of East Rudham.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Creake, for Will. Rans ...,

notesStmt.note: "To the Christian reader" signed: John Ramsey.
Reproduction of original in the Emanuel College Library, Cambridge University.

The growth of tares -- Lapis Lydius, or, The trial of spirits --Agippa, or, The semi-Christian -- The inner-temple -- St. Paul's tack ticks --The politick reformation -- The usurpation of the priesthood, or, The scourge of sacriledge -- The Christian mans task, explained & applied -- Unum necessarium, or, Charity is all in all.
